data.name: SetupRequest
data.value: Please enter your Clockify API token. If you have no idea what that is, don't worry, just look for it in [this page](https://clockify.me/user/settings)

data.name: SetupReject
data.value: Sorry, but this token is not valid. Please give me a proper one to continue

data.name: SetupFeedback
data.value: Thanks! We will use this token whenever establishing a Clockify connection from now on ⚙

data.name: TaskCreationError
data.value: Sorry, it appears you can't create tasks

data.name: TaskUnrecognized
data.value: I can't get a matching task...

data.name: TaskCreation
data.value: What is the name of the task you want to create?

data.name: TaskAbort
data.value: Ok, as you wish

data.name: AddEntryFeedback
data.value: Ok, I added {0:0} minutes entry on {1}. In total you have now {2:0.00} hours filled

data.name: EntryFillUnderstandingError
data.value: Sorry, I can see you want to fill some entries, but I have troubles understanding how many and on which project... Can you try and be more specific?

data.name: AmbiguousProjectError
data.value: Sorry, but the project you mention is ambiguous, I can't choose between {0} and {1}

data.name: ProjectUnrecognized
data.value: Sorry, I don't find a project matching {0}

data.name: TaskUnrecognizedRetry
data.value: I can't get a matching task... can you be more specific?

data.name: TaskSelectionQuestion
data.value: Any task in particular?

data.name: No
data.value: no

data.name: NewTask
data.value: new task

data.name: ReportDateRangeError
data.value: I get that you want a report, but I can't understand the period you requested 😕. Can you be more specific?

data.name: ReportWorkedPeriodUnrecognized
data.value: I can see you want to report some hours, but I really can't understand how many 😕

data.name: ReportTotalHours
data.value: Between {0}, you worked **{1:0.00}** days ({2} hours)

data.name: ReportNoWork
data.value: No work to report on workspace **{0}**

data.name: ReportWork
data.value: Work reported on workspace **{0}**:

data.name: RemindEntryFill_1
data.value: Hey! 💁 My gears tell me your timesheet needs entries. Be nice, make me happy. Tell me some work you did 🙏

data.name: RemindEntryFill_2
data.value: Here I am 🙈, a bot reminding a human to do a timesheet. What a strange world. Btw, what did you do today?

data.name: RemindEntryFill_3
data.value: Ok, no need to go crazy. Just your friendly reminder here. If you want me to stop, just say so. I'll get offended, though ☹.

data.name: RemindEntryFill_4
data.value: 💡 Do you know that timesheets reported once per day are way more accurate than when you report your time once per week? Go on, go fill up your entries, you'll thank me later.

data.name: RemindEntryFill_5
data.value: When I was a child I wanted to be a surgeon 😌. Then I remembered I'm a chat bot, so I became a Clockify assistant. Ah, can you please tell me what you did today on your projects? Give my life some meaning, man.

data.name: RemindEntryFill_6
data.value: 🎵 What you doing? Where you at? Oh, you got plans? Don't say that. Ok, now that I've Bruno Marsed you, can you please remember to do your daily timesheet?

data.name: RemindEntryFill_7
data.value: Roses are red, violets are blue, please do your timesheet or I'll come to you 🌹

data.name: RemindEntryFill_8
data.value: Hey 👋 feeling like doing your timesheet?

data.name: RemindEntryFill_9
data.value: You should be done working by now, why don't you tell me what you did today?

data.name: RemindEntryFill_10
data.value: Hey man, your timesheet for the day sucks. Can you add some more entries?

data.name: RemindEntryFill_11
data.value: .-.. --- .-.. Just some morse code to remind you to do your timesheet

data.name: RemindEntryFill_12
data.value: 🌎 Ok let's try international languages: bonvolu plenigi vian tempan raporton

data.name: RemindEntryFill_13
data.value: Gotcha! You haven't reported your workday fully, have you? I can help!

data.name: RemindEntryFill_14
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/3N9NgyRX/couple-problems.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_15
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/K8jkD5tR/batman.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_16
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/85Q7DQ96/bernie-sanders.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_17
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/QNqFLzbF/smart-move.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_18
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/fT2ky01Z/crazy-seagul.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_19
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/kXXB7y1f/skeleton-waiting.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_20
data.value: https://i.postimg.cc/QCjV9gXN/ear-phrase.jpg

data.name: RemindEntryFill_21
data.value: Hey! A study from the University of Barminghton found that people who report their daily timesheet can extend their lifetime from 2 to 5 yea... just kidding 😅. But let's imagine that was true

data.name: RemindEntryFill_22
data.value: 🦊 What does th fox say? Do your Clockify.

data.name: RemindEntryFill_23
data.value: Bot insights 🤖: some day my kind could take over the planet. Be gentle and tell me your day... now that you still can.

data.name: RemindStopAnswer
data.value: Ok, no more reminders for today, you have my word 🤙

data.name: ReportDateRangeExceedOneYear
data.value: omg that's a looot of time😰{0} Please don't exceed one year window

data.name: FollowUp
data.value: Hey 👋 I noticed you never setup a Clockify token...{0}{0}Help me help you! Once you're setup I will assist you in your daily time tracking.
